DESCRIPTION: Takes 10% more damage for each stack of Hunted on them. When applied, all other hunted enemies are no longer hunted, and other enemies take 10% less damage for each stack.
Takes 10% less damage from attacks for each stack. When the hunted enemy dies, remove this.
At the end of the turn that no enemy intends to attack you, gain 2 Strength.
At the end of the turn, gain Block. When taking unblocked attack damage, remove this.
